snippet: T. J. Brodie scored the winner 2 minutes 9 seconds into the extra period after the Rangers rallied from a 4-1 third-period deficit.
lead_paragraph: T. J. Brodie scored the winner 2 minutes 9 seconds into the extra period after the Rangers rallied from a 4-1 third-period deficit.

headline.main: Rangers Force Overtime but Lose to Flames
headline.print_headline: Rangers Force Overtime but Lose to Flames
